title: [Plains of Bone, Virktoth's Path]
description: The slope of the stairway increases uncomfortably, the risers becoming higher steadily.  The steps become narrower, nothing more then room to place toes or fingers during descent or ascent.  A few iron rings anchored to the outside edge of the stairway still hold their black paint, moonlight glinting from their rustless metal.

A few iron rings anchored to the outside edge of the stairway still hold their black paint, rust not affecting them in the least.
